A Fusion of Artistry and Innovation

The Buffet Crampon Gala A Clarinet represents the pinnacle of French craftsmanship, combining the timeless elegance of its Légende and Tradition predecessors with innovative design. This professional-grade clarinet delivers rich harmonics, exceptional responsiveness, and an accessible price point, making it a favorite among dedicated musicians.

The Gala A Clarinet offers a versatile and balanced tonal palette that seamlessly adapts to various musical genres. Crafted from premium grenadilla wood, its precise construction ensures consistent intonation and expressive dynamics across all registers, making it ideal for both solo and ensemble performances.

Highlighted by its black nickel-plated rings and refined medallion, the Gala A Clarinet exudes understated elegance. Equipped with leather pads and a poly-cylindrical bore, it offers exceptional playability and a warm, resonant sound that meets the demands of professional musicians.

Handcrafted in Buffet Crampon’s French workshops, the Gala A Clarinet is a testament to traditional expertise and modern innovation. Its ergonomic design, adjustable thumb rest, and lightweight pochette-style case make it both a pleasure to play and transport.

The Buffet Crampon Gala A Clarinet combines superior craftsmanship with exceptional tonal quality, offering musicians a perfect balance of innovation and tradition. Elevate your performances with this masterfully designed instrument.

The Versatile Choice for Professional Musicians

Designed in 1987 with guidance from Jacques Lancelot, Guy Deplus, and Michel Arrignon, the Buffet Crampon Festival A Clarinet meets the highest demands of today’s soloists, teachers, and advanced students. With exceptional versatility and tonal richness, it’s the ideal clarinet for interpreting a wide repertoire, from classical to contemporary.

The Festival A Clarinet combines Buffet Crampon’s legendary craftsmanship with modern innovation. Its poly-cylindrical bore ensures precise intonation and smooth transitions across all registers, delivering a warm, resonant sound that projects effortlessly in any setting.
A Symphony of Design and Function

Made from premium, unstained grenadilla wood, the Festival A Clarinet offers durability and tonal clarity. Its silver-plated keywork ensures smooth action and reliability, while the adjustable thumb rest and E♭/A♭ lever provide enhanced ergonomic comfort for extended play.

Whether performing Mozart, Boulez, or anything in between, the Festival A Clarinet adapts seamlessly to diverse musical styles. Its expressive capabilities and professional-grade construction make it a top choice for musicians seeking excellence in sound and versatility.
Ligature, mouthpiece cap, swab, cork grease, pencil

The Buffet Crampon Festival A Clarinet offers unparalleled sound quality, versatility, and durability. With its professional-grade features and impeccable design, this clarinet is the perfect companion for musicians aiming for excellence.

Since its creation in 1955 by Robert Carrée, the Buffet Crampon R13 A Clarinet has become a cornerstone of professional clarinet performance. Known for its rich harmonics, powerful projection, and warm centered tone, it continues to captivate soloists, orchestras, students, and amateurs worldwide.

The R13 A Clarinet offers unmatched versatility, excelling across symphonic, chamber, and solo repertoire. Its poly-cylindrical bore ensures precise intonation and seamless transitions, allowing musicians to explore the full range of their artistry with confidence and ease.

Crafted from high-quality grenadilla wood, the R13 A Clarinet produces a warm, resonant tone. Its silver-plated keywork provides a smooth, reliable feel, while the adjustable thumb rest offers ergonomic comfort for extended play sessions. Designed for musicians who demand precision, this clarinet is a timeless classic.

The R13’s legacy as a professional standard is rooted in its consistent performance and quality. Whether performing intricate technical passages or lyrical melodies, this clarinet delivers exceptional sound and reliability that players have trusted for decades.
Ligature, mouthpiece cap, swab, cork grease, pencil

The Buffet Crampon R13 A Clarinet continues to set the standard for professional clarinets. With its unparalleled craftsmanship, tonal flexibility, and rich legacy, it remains an essential instrument for musicians aspiring to greatness.

Where Professional Sound Meets Student Accessibility

The Buffet Crampon E12F B♭ Clarinet is designed for advanced students and professionals seeking an instrument that combines professional sound quality, precise intonation, and comfortable playability. Developed through Franco-German expertise, this clarinet reflects the best of Buffet Crampon’s craftsmanship.
A Professional Experience for Aspiring Musicians

The E12F offers a warm, resonant tone and precise tuning across registers, thanks to its expertly crafted poly-cylindrical bore. Whether you're performing solo or in an ensemble, the E12F's versatility and expressive sound make it an ideal instrument for advancing your musical journey.

Featuring an adjustable thumb rest and balanced weight distribution, the E12F ensures comfort during long practice sessions or performances. Its durable African blackwood body is treated and lacquered to withstand the rigors of regular use, while leather pads and blue steel springs provide responsive playability and reliable sealing.

The E12F is crafted in France and assembled with care in Germany, incorporating features from Buffet Crampon's professional line. The digitally calibrated tone holes and silver-plated keywork reflect the high standards of French and German engineering, ensuring consistent performance for every player.
Dalbergia Melanoxylon, unstained African blackwood, treated and lacquered

The Buffet Crampon E12F B♭ Clarinet offers an unmatched combination of professional sound and student accessibility. Its ergonomic design, precise intonation, and quality craftsmanship make it the perfect choice for advancing musicians.

*  Page Title: Buffet Crampon 1180 Student Bass Clarinet – Ideal for Young Musicians
*  Meta Description: Explore the Buffet Crampon 1180 Student Bass Clarinet,
*  crafted with African blackwood and a redesigned register system for superior playability.

The Buffet Crampon 1180 Student Bass Clarinet is the world’s leading choice for young musicians and amateurs seeking a bass clarinet with professional-grade features. With its redesigned register key system, high-quality African blackwood body, and exceptional craftsmanship, it sets a new standard for student instruments.

Designed with a simplified register key system and a comfortable ergonomic layout, the 1180 Bass Clarinet offers unmatched ease of playability. Its wide, expressive sound palette makes it a versatile choice for any musical genre, helping students grow musically while enjoying a professional experience.

Made from carefully selected African blackwood (Dalbergia melanoxylon), the 1180 boasts a warm, resonant tone that complements its solid construction. With features like an adjustable thumb rest, silver-plated copper bell, and lightweight backpack case, this clarinet offers exceptional comfort and portability.

From its blue steel springs ensuring fluid key movement to its leather pads for a reliable seal, the 1180 delivers precision in every note. The redesigned chalumeau register enhances interval transitions, making it easier for students to explore a full range of musical expression with confidence.

Discover the joy of bass clarinet with the Buffet Crampon 1180 Student Bass Clarinet. Its professional-level features, unmatched sound quality, and exceptional craftsmanship make it the perfect instrument for students and aspiring musicians.

The Buffet Crampon Tosca Bass Clarinet redefines symphonic standards with its luminous tone, innovative design, and soundless key mechanism. Perfectly blending traditional craftsmanship with modern advancements, it is the premier choice for professional musicians demanding excellence.

Introduced in 2014, the Tosca Bass Clarinet represents the culmination of Buffet Crampon’s expertise in crafting high-performance instruments. Its new Tosca bore design and ergonomic keywork ensure effortless playability, while its luminous tone enhances symphonic textures and solo passages alike.

Equipped with a unique register key system and soundless keying, the Tosca Bass Clarinet offers an unmatched playing experience. The rubber dampers eliminate key noise, and the adjustable thumb key ensures customized comfort, allowing musicians to perform with confidence and precision.
Constructed from premium grenadilla wood, the Tosca’s robust design and metal-capped tenons guarantee durability. Its double low D &amp
column2: E♭ keys and synthetic cork neck add versatility, making it suitable for a wide range of symphonic and solo repertoire.

A Trusted Instrument for the Advancing Musician

For over 40 years, the Buffet Crampon E13 B♭ Clarinet has been a benchmark for quality and reliability. Originating from the renowned BC20 model, this clarinet has been the choice of advanced students and conservatory-level musicians seeking a rich, resonant tone and professional-grade features.

The E13 blends Buffet Crampon’s heritage with modern innovation, producing a clarinet that excels in tonal projection and harmonic richness. Its cylindrical bore and grenadilla wood body ensure a focused, centered tone, ideal for solo and ensemble performances alike.

Featuring silver-plated keywork, blue steel springs, and leather pads, the E13 offers a premium playing experience. The addition of a redesigned bell, inspired by the RC model, provides enhanced projection and clarity, while the adjustable thumb rest accommodates all playing styles comfortably.

Experience the enduring legacy of the Buffet Crampon E13 B♭ Clarinet. Its professional-grade features and versatile performance capabilities make it an excellent choice for advanced players seeking a refined, reliable instrument.

The Buffet Crampon Tradition B♭ Clarinet, inspired by the acclaimed Legende model, embodies pure sound and exquisite craftsmanship. Introduced in 2019, it carries forward the legacy of Buffet Crampon’s iconic BC20 model while incorporating modern enhancements for today’s professional musicians.

The Tradition B♭ Clarinet delivers a woody, well-centered tone reminiscent of the BC20 model, reimagined for the modern performer. Its cylindrical bore ensures even intonation and projection, while the refined features provide a professional playing experience that meets the highest expectations.

Borrowing features from the premium Legende model, the Tradition B♭ Clarinet includes metal tenon caps, a low F correction key, and a vertical medallion for added elegance. Each clarinet is crafted from natural, unstained grenadilla wood at Buffet Crampon’s workshops in Mantes la Ville, France, ensuring superior quality and craftsmanship.

From its ergonomic adjustable thumb rest to the high-grade blue steel springs, every element of the Tradition clarinet is optimized for comfort, precision, and durability. It bridges the gap between classic artistry and cutting-edge design, making it the preferred choice for clarinetists aiming for perfection.

The Buffet Crampon Tradition B♭ Clarinet blends the best of heritage and modern innovation, delivering a pure, centered sound with refined features. Elevate your performance with an instrument crafted for the discerning professional.

*  Page Title: Buffet Crampon RC B♭ Clarinet – A Legacy of Excellence
*  Meta Description: Explore the Buffet Crampon RC B♭ Clarinet, redesigned for
*  professional performance with enhanced intonation, warm tone, and even response.
A Masterpiece of Legacy and Innovation

The Buffet Crampon RC B♭ Clarinet represents the visionary contributions of Robert Carrée, whose poly-cylindrical bore design redefined clarinet acoustics. Redesigned in 2014, this instrument offers enhanced intonation, a warm, centered tone, and even response for professionals and aspiring musicians alike.

Crafted from premium grenadilla wood or GreenLinE material, the RC B♭ Clarinet offers rich, warm tones and consistent projection. The ergonomic keywork and adjustable thumb rest ensure unparalleled comfort and ease of play, making this clarinet a favorite among professionals and students striving for excellence.

Robert Carrée’s poly-cylindrical bore revolutionized clarinet design, creating instruments with improved tonal evenness, projection, and resonance. The RC model embodies his dedication to enhancing both the artistry and mechanics of woodwind instruments.
A Clarinet Built for the Modern Performer

Redesigned in 2014, the RC model incorporates over a decade of acoustic research to meet the evolving demands of contemporary musicians. Its precise intonation, warm tone, and responsive feel make it an indispensable tool for achieving musical excellence.

Explore the brilliance of the Buffet Crampon RC B♭ Clarinet. Its legacy of innovation and refined design continues to inspire musicians worldwide, offering an unmatched combination of tone, precision, and playability.

*  Page Title: Buffet Crampon RC E♭ Clarinet – Legacy and Innovation
*  Meta Description: Discover the legacy of Robert Carrée and the Buffet Crampon RC E♭ Clarinet,
*  a masterpiece blending professional craftsmanship with innovative design.

The Buffet Crampon RC E♭ Clarinet celebrates the ingenuity of Robert Carrée, whose poly-cylindrical bore design revolutionized clarinet acoustics. Redesigned in 2014, this model combines tradition with cutting-edge acoustical advancements, offering unparalleled tone, projection, and balance for professional musicians.

Crafted from premium grenadilla wood or GreenLinE, the RC E♭ Clarinet produces a warm, centered tone with precise intonation. Its ergonomic keywork and advanced bore design ensure effortless playability, making it a versatile instrument for solo performances and ensemble work alike.

Robert Carrée’s contributions to Buffet Crampon include the development of the poly-cylindrical bore, which transformed the acoustic performance of clarinets. This design innovation allows for improved projection, tonal evenness, and resonance, setting the standard for modern clarinet construction.

The RC model exemplifies Carrée’s dedication to elevating the artistry of woodwind instruments. Its redesign in 2014 incorporated over a decade of acoustical research, resulting in a clarinet that meets the highest expectations of today’s professional musicians.

Celebrate the legacy of innovation with the Buffet Crampon RC E♭ Clarinet. Its superior tone, advanced design, and ergonomic features make it the instrument of choice for musicians striving for excellence.

Page Title: Buffet Crampon Mopane R13 B♭ Clarinet – Legendary Sound, Reinvented
Meta Description: Discover the Buffet Crampon R13 B♭ Clarinet crafted with rare Southern African mopane wood, renowned for its warm, mellow tone and versatility across all registers.
Buffet Crampon Mopane R13 B♭ Clarinet
Discover legendary sound enhanced by rare mopane wood

The timeless R13 B♭ Clarinet meets Southern African mopane wood, merging Buffet Crampon’s historic design with a warm, mellow resonance. Ideal for professionals and enthusiasts seeking a powerful, nuanced tone in every register.

The Buffet Crampon Mopane R13 B♭ Clarinet brings a fresh twist to a legendary instrument. Known for its lush, reddish-brown hue, mopane wood not only adds visual elegance but also imparts a richer, warmer timbre to the iconic R13 model. Limited in availability, this special edition maintains the clarinet’s hallmark versatility while introducing a uniquely captivating sonic character.

By combining the famous poly-cylindrical bore with mopane’s innate acoustic properties, this edition offers remarkable projection and tonal depth. From hushed pianissimos to full-bodied fortes, it captures every subtlety in your performance without sacrificing clarity or brilliance across any register.

Since its creation in 1955 by Robert Carrée, the R13 has resonated with top-level musicians for its flexibility, focused sound, and robust intonation. The addition of mopane elevates this classic, delivering a beautifully balanced tone that appeals to symphony players, soloists, teachers, and advancing students alike.
For those seeking tradition and innovation, the Mopane R13 B♭ Clarinet offers the best of both worlds—iconic design and an upgraded acoustic profile that amplifies musical expression.
17 keys, 6 rings, adjustable thumb rest, nickel silver

Page Title: RZ Andante B♭ Clarinet – Ideal for Student & Intermediate Players
Meta Description: The RZ Andante B♭ Clarinet is crafted for student and intermediate musicians, offering warm tone, durable construction, and comfortable playability.
A Dependable Choice for Emerging Musicians

Handcrafted from premium Grenadilla wood, the RZ Andante B♭ Clarinet delivers a full-bodied tone that helps student and intermediate players shine. Its comfortable design and durable components encourage steady progress, ensuring that every note resonates with clarity.

Whether preparing for school band rehearsals or practicing for recitals, the Andante B♭ Clarinet offers reliability and comfort that encourage steady musical development. Its ergonomic thumb rest reduces fatigue during extended sessions, while leather pads maintain a secure seal for enhanced pitch stability.

Outfitted with 17 keys and 6 rings, the RZ Andante boasts silver-plated keywork for a polished look and effortless action. The included single barrel, along with an RZ student set mouthpiece, ligature, and cap, equips you with everything needed to achieve a balanced, resonant sound from day one.

Accompanied by a complete cleaning set and a sturdy RZ case, the Andante clarinet remains performance-ready and protected on the go. This cohesive package ensures you can focus on refining your technique while maintaining the instrument’s pristine condition.
From expanding your repertoire to enhancing tonal control, the RZ Andante B♭ Clarinet supports an enjoyable learning curve for developing musicians.
Andante B♭ Clarinet at a Glance

Unlock your potential with the RZ Andante B♭ Clarinet. Thoughtfully designed for comfortable play and dependable tone, it nurtures each step of your musical journey, from the practice room to the performance stage.

Meta Description: The RZ Conservatory B♭ Clarinet is crafted for intermediate musicians, offering rich sound, ergonomic comfort, and high-quality construction.
Elevate Your Performance with the RZ Conservatory B♭ Clarinet

The RZ Conservatory B♭ Clarinet is expertly designed for the intermediate musician, providing a rich and warm sound through its premium Grenadilla wood construction. With a 440/442 Hz pitch, this clarinet is crafted for serious players who demand quality and comfort.

This clarinet features durable leather pads and an adjustable thumb rest, combining longevity with ergonomic comfort for extended playability. The heavily silver-plated keywork enhances elegance and provides increased resistance to wear, ensuring reliable performance over time.

Included with the RZ Conservatory B♭ Clarinet are a single barrel, an RZ case, and a cleaning set, offering everything you need for proper upkeep. For added functionality, an optional alternate E♭ lever is available, ensuring adaptability for a range of musical demands.

Whether you’re focused on honing your skills or preparing for recitals, the RZ Conservatory B♭ Clarinet offers superior tone, reliable performance, and comfortable handling. Step up your musical journey with a clarinet designed to support and inspire intermediate players who strive for excellence.

Page Title: RZ Allegro B♭ Clarinet – Authentic Tone and Superior Craftsmanship
Meta Description: Discover the RZ Allegro B♭ Clarinet, crafted from slow-aged Grenadilla wood for authentic tone, superior key action, and exceptional Czech craftsmanship.

Experience unparalleled craftsmanship with the RZ Allegro B♭ Clarinet, meticulously crafted from unstained, slow-aged Grenadilla wood for a warm, resonant tone. Featuring a spring displacement mechanism for superior key action, heavily silver-plated keywork, and comfortable leather pads, this clarinet helps you focus on what truly matters—your performance.

With a unique spring displacement mechanism attaching the flaps between the posts, the RZ Allegro responds instantly to the player’s touch. Its durable leather pads and an adjustable thumb rest ensure a secure seal and effortless handling, making practice sessions and performances equally enjoyable.

Handcrafted from a minimum of 7-year slow-aged Grenadilla wood, the RZ Allegro’s unstained finish showcases its natural beauty. This model boasts heavily silver-plated keywork with carbon rings for added durability and style, embodying the fusion of form and function that is the hallmark of Czech instrument design.

Featuring two barrels for precise intonation adjustments, the RZ Allegro B♭ Clarinet adapts seamlessly to a range of musical settings. Along with an RZ case and cleaning set, you’ll have everything you need to maintain and transport your clarinet with ease.
Whether you’re advancing your studies or taking the stage, the RZ Allegro delivers performance-ready reliability and the warmth of authentic Czech craftsmanship.
Spring displacement mechanism for superior key action

Embodying remarkable craftsmanship and authentic tonal excellence, the RZ Allegro B♭ Clarinet is an investment in your musical future. Harness its quick response, comfortable design, and beautiful resonance to transform every note into an inspiring performance.

Page Title: Buffet Crampon Pocket Clarinet – Inspire Young Musicians
Meta Description: Jumpstart a musical journey with the Buffet Crampon Pocket Clarinet. Lightweight, kid-friendly, and crafted from Mozambique grenadilla wood for rich tone.
A Perfect Start for Little Hands

Three years of meticulous research led to the Buffet Crampon Pocket Clarinet, a groundbreaking way for young learners to begin their musical journey. Built from Mozambique grenadilla wood (Dalbergia melanoxylon), this instrument provides authentic clarinet tone, offering the chance to develop solid technique while having fun along the way.

The Pocket Clarinet gives children the confidence to explore music with a real single-reed instrument. It uses a B♭ clarinet mouthpiece to ensure proper embouchure development, smoothly transitioning students toward a full-sized B♭ clarinet in the future. Its lightweight body and adjustable thumb rest make handling easier for smaller hands, helping kids maintain comfort during practice.

Developed in collaboration with Buffet Crampon experts from France and Germany, the Pocket Clarinet preserves quality craftsmanship while focusing on ease of play. Its Mozambique grenadilla wood body produces a warm, resonant tone that encourages budding musicians to truly appreciate the clarinet’s distinct sound.

Children can immerse themselves in music from day one, thanks to the clarinet’s ergonomic design and innovative research-backed bore. This thoughtfully crafted instrument paves the way for correct posture, proper hand positioning, and embouchure technique—critical foundations for players looking to transition smoothly to a standard B♭ clarinet.

Whether exploring school band repertoire or preparing for private lessons, young musicians will discover the joy of creating a full, vibrant clarinet tone at an earlier age. The Buffet Crampon Pocket Clarinet is more than an introduction
column2: it’s a solid foundation for a lifetime of music.

column1: Optimized bore for balanced intonation across registers

Start your child’s musical journey with the Buffet Crampon Pocket Clarinet. Offering an authentic clarinet experience, it fosters skill-building, inspires creativity, and sets the stage for smooth progression to a standard B♭ clarinet.

Buffet Crampon Festival B♭ Clarinet - Limited Edition
Only 100 Units Worldwide – Crafted for Excellence

The Buffet Crampon Festival B♭ Clarinet, Limited Edition, is a stunning collector’s item and a professional musician’s dream. Crafted from rare mopane wood and featuring exquisite rose gold-plated finishes, this clarinet blends traditional craftsmanship with modern innovation to deliver unparalleled tonal brilliance and projection.
A Masterpiece for Collectors and Professionals

With only 100 clarinets produced globally, the Limited Edition Festival B♭ Clarinet is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to own a true work of art. Its mopane wood body offers a unique tonal profile—rich, resonant, and full of brilliance. Paired with rose gold-plated keywork and the hallmark craftsmanship of Buffet Crampon, this clarinet is as stunning visually as it is acoustically.

Designed with input from legendary clarinetists Jacques Lancelot, Guy Deplus, and Michel Arrignon, the Limited Edition Festival clarinet incorporates the best of Buffet Crampon’s craftsmanship. Featuring a low F correction key, two interchangeable barrels (65 mm and 66 mm), and rose gold-plated accents, it offers both aesthetic and acoustic perfection.

Mopane wood, renowned for its density and tonal warmth, provides a rich, resonant sound that balances softness with projection. The Grand Siècle-inspired finish adds a luxurious touch, while features like the NFT certificate of authenticity make this clarinet a true collector’s item. This instrument is designed to excel in a wide range of repertoire, from classical to contemporary.
Ligature, Mouthpiece Cap, Swab, Cork Grease, Pencil

The Buffet Crampon Festival B♭ Clarinet - Limited Edition is an extraordinary instrument for discerning musicians and collectors. Its combination of rare materials, advanced features, and limited availability make it a true masterpiece in the world of professional clarinets.
